class.name: TridiagonalSimilarDecomposition

javadoc.text:
* Finds the decomposition of a matrix in the form of:
*
* A = O*T*OT
*
* where A is a symmetric m by m matrix, O is an orthogonal matrix, and T is a tridiagonal matrix. *
javadoc.author: Peter Abeles

javadoc.text: Extracts the tridiagonal matrix found in the decomposition.
javadoc.param: T If not null then the results will be stored here. Otherwise a new matrix will be created.

javadoc.text: An orthogonal matrix that has the following property: T = Q<sup>T</sup>AQ
javadoc.param: Q If not null then the results will be stored here. Otherwise a new matrix will be created.

javadoc.text: Extracts the diagonal and off diagonal elements of the decomposed tridiagonal matrix. * Since it is symmetric only one off diagonal array is returned.

class.comment:
